name: Wake Up (itch) (JanMatyooStudio)
description:
All your friends fell into a deep sleep and they started sleepwalking. An unknown creature lures your friends, they will die. You are the only hope. Save them all. Wake them Up!

To wake them up without using violence, throw water at your friend. And also you can scream at them all at once to wake them up! Prevent them from dying while they are sleepwalking.
